titles.title: A bill to increase the penalty for failure to comply with lobbying disclosure requirements.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 (LDA) to increase from $50,000 to $200,00 the civil fine for noncompliance with LDA disclosure requirements.
